fixes.name: Carry T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustomDate,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Carry],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = EndDateParam,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Carry],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE(...) and converted nested IF logic to DAX. All field references were mapped to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column] format. Used VARs for parameter values and a RETURN with nested IFs for clarity.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references Tableau parameters ([Parameters]), and per rules any parameter-based calculation must be implemented as a measure.
